attributes.action: stop plans for the 150ft statue of a horse in Ebbsfleet, Kent, which will cost £3 million
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we are petitioning to stop the statue of a horse planned to be built in Ebbsfleet, Kent. during this time of recession we believe that this a total waste of money that could be used more appropriately such as to help the aged, renovating the town, helping the homeless etc. as well as this we believe it will be nothing more than an eyesore.

rejection.details: Please contact the Ebbsfleet Landmark Project (London & Continental Railways, Land Securities and Eurostar).
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
